title: From the Mission to the Marina — The Long Way

panels.caption: Wheels rolling at 7:23 AM from the Mission — coffee was still brewing when the engine turned over.
panels.speechBubble: Early start. No traffic. Let's go.

panels.caption: The Bay Bridge at 7:41 AM — averaging 88 km/h through the toll plaza, the skyline rising on the left.
A 22-minute stop at the Embarcadero — the fleet's 14th visit to this waterfront district this quarter. The Bay Bridge looms, lunch spots hum, and someone probably got a flat white.
panels.speechBubble: 14th time here. The baristas know the order.

panels.caption: Arrival at the Marina at 9:52 AM — 83.4 km door to door, average 72 km/h. Mission accomplished.
